Welcome readers

Want to see older posts? See historical posts on devinvenable.blogspot.com.

For a number of years I also kept up a mediawiki, which I plan to revive soon and a link will appear here.

I cover my machine learning research with audio and other technical topics on youtube.

I make music too! I post partially finished works of original music soundcloud.com/init-dot-d.

Sometimes a few of them make it to Spotify, like this album.

I also enjoy making music videos with Blender and you can find a few here on youtube.
